members.name: Jeff Galloway
members.title: Founder
members.bio: Jeff has been active in many corporate IT Project Management for many years, and comes from a background of Project Delivery and Execution with expertise in bringing many people and skills together for a common technology goal.   This is coupled with years of extensive Open Source software experience, in particular, Data Science and Blockchain development

members.name: Wade Ferraris
members.title: CFO
members.bio: Wade is an educated, exerienced, and promising entrepreneur with many gifts and skillsets and a track record of successful, well managed business startups and ventures.  He has a passion for and strong understanding of cryptocurrency that is well utilized with SafeCoin

members.name: Beshoy Girgis
members.title: Technical Advisor
members.bio: An all-around information technology professional (software engineer) with experience in: front and back-end web software and database development, mobile application development and Linux and Apple and Windows server administration.  I love to learn and strive to remain on the edge of the technology curve.

members.name: Mark Willams
members.title: Graphic Design Lead
members.bio: Mark Williams is a video marketing strategist with over 5 years of extensive “hands-on” experience in online marketing, video creation, and design. He believes that all marketing strategies should begin with a commitment to creating genuine human connections and authentic relationships. When Mark is not in front of a computer he can be found competing on the soccer fields of New Jersey.

members.name: Gary Figg
members.title: Operations Lead
members.bio: Gary is a self described computer nerd, but is so much more to us. Started with a TRS-80 Model One 40 years ago and never stopped. Wallet beta testing along with with logistical support for new members, airdrops, and bounty campaigns.

members.name: Coming Soon
members.title: Team Lead
members.bio: The greatest strength of SafeCoin is it's team and community.  SafeCoin has a rapidly growing team of talented individuals that have helped in every aspect of this coin's development and continue to make it better daily.  We are in the process of updating and publishing our talented team members.
